   3. Determine if the cross code debut for Dave Valentine was an Rugby League (RL) 1st Test between Great Britain and Australia. The row with the player "Dave Valentine" (row index: 2) shows that his RL international debut was, in fact, a test against Australia.
   4. Compare the two events on October 9th, 1948 for Dave Valentine, as described in the claim. The cross code debut was an RL 1st Test between Great Britain and Australia (as per the table), and the international debut was a RU Five Nations match against Ireland (as per the table). On this day, both events described in the claim occurred for Dave Valentine.
